tool_description: Secure Auth API. Create users and manage them. JWT login system. Huge relationship DataBase with SQL.
name: Auth100
title: Auth100

api_list.name: User Login
api_list.description: User login and get accessToken and set refreshToken
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://auth100.p.rapidapi.com/cerve/api/v1.0/login"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "auth100.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Request change password
